problem_type: Student places sixths or eighths fractions beyond 1 on a pre-partitioned number line
workspace_description: Number line from 0 to 2, pre-partitioned into sixths with tick marks at 0, 1/6, 2/6, 3/6, 4/6, 5/6, 1, 7/6, 8/6, 9/6, 10/6, 11/6, 2. Labels visible at 0, 1, and 2 only.
prompt: Place seven-sixths on the number line.
